thread.section_title: iMazing Bewertungen | Kundenbewertungen von iMazing | imazing.com
thread.title: Matt

author: Matt
title: Matt
text: I purchased iMazing about a year and a half ago. It now NO LONGER is supported on my iPhone, BUT I haven't changed phones. I still have the exact phone, but since the update with the iOS, now IT IS USELESS! Customer support will do NOTHING about it. Except to tell me to BUY IT AGAIN!? That's ridiculous. Who knows if it'll happen again soon? Do we just keep paying every year a new iOS comes out? Once a loyal customer that would rave about this product to everyone; I can't believe this.
